title: Generative AI-Based Language Education Content Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners are corporate foreign language education managers who design and implement job-related language education content using generative AI tools through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners create three job-specific customized language learning scenarios using generative AI platforms (ChatGPT, DALL·E, etc.)
Learners establish criteria for evaluating the pedagogical suitability of AI-generated content and apply them to real-world projects

Based on peer feedback, learners will revise and improve three types of AI-generated learning materials (e.g., image/text-generated content) three or more times at two-week intervals and achieve a grade of 'B+' or higher in four of the five peer evaluation rubric criteria for the final output.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
